info.title: thanks.io API
info.description: Use thanks.io to send postcards, letters, notecards, windowless letters, and giftcards through our API.

first.description: URL of the first page of results

last.description: URL of the last page of results

prev.description: URL of the previous page of results

next.description: URL of the next page of results

from.description: Index of the first item on the current page

from.description: Index of the first item on the current page

last_page_url.description: URL of the last page of results

prev_page_url.description: URL of the previous page of results

preview.description: Set to true to preview the postcard instead of sending it.  This can be used with any send call to get a preview before sending.

mailing_lists.description: ID of mailing list to sent to.  Required if recipients and radius_search is not specified.

recipients.description: Array of recipients to send to.  Required if mailing_lists and radius_search is not specified.

radius_search.description: Search for recipients within a radius of a given address.  Required if mailing_lists and recipients are not specified. There is a $.05 lookup fee for each record.

preview.description: Return a preview of number of neighbors found and cost.

address.description: Street address to use for center of nearest neighbor search.

postal_code.description: Postal code to use for center of nearest neighbor search.

record_count.description: Number of nearest neighbors to search for.

record_types.description: Which type of records to search for

append_data.description: Append phone and email to each record for an additional fee ($.20 per record).

use_property_owner.description: Use Property Owners Address when searching for a commercial record_type.

handwriting_style.description: ID of handwriting style to use.

handwriting_color.description: Handwriting color to use. Options are preset named colors or specified as hex format, such as '#4287f5'

handwriting_realism.description: Boolean, set to true to turn on the realism effect for AI fonts.

sub_account.description: ID of Sub Account to use for this order.

email_additional.description: Optional email to send alerts to about order (such as QR scan notifications).

send_standard_mail.description: Send Mail as Standard Mail postage class.  If false or not specified, First Class postage will be used.

send-mailer-order-response.title: Send Mailer Order Submitted Response
send-mailer-order-response.description: Response when an Order is successfully submitted to Send Mailer

sub_account.description: Sub-account Info For Order.  Can be null

sub_account_id.description: Sub account ID for the order

total_estimated_recipients.description: Total estimated recipients for the order

authorization_total.description: Total authorization amount for the order in cents

leads_fee.description: Total leads fee for the order in cents

mailing_list_ids_used.description: Mailing lists used for the order.  Can be null if recipients or radius search is used.

recipients.description: List of recipients for the order

front_image.description: Front image URL for the order

image_template_id.description: Image template ID for the order

custom_background_url.description: Custom background URL for the order

style.description: Handwriting style ID for the order

append_or_current_resident.description: Appended "Or Current Resident" for the order.  This is helpful if you want to ensure delivery.

return_address.description: Return address line 1 for the order

return_address2.description: Return address line 2 for the order

return_postal_code.description: Return postal code for the order

size.description: Size of the order (valid for postcards only)

qrcode_url.description: QR code URL for the order

giftcard_brand.description: Gift card brand for the order (valid for Giftcard orders only)

giftcard_image.description: Gift card image URL for the order (valid for Giftcard orders only)

giftcard_amount.description: Gift card amount for the order in cents (valid for Giftcard orders only)

giftcard_brand_longname.description: Gift card brand long name for the order (valid for Giftcard orders only)

updated_at.description: Last updated timestamp for the order

send-mailer-preview-response.description: Images representing preview of order.  Response when `preview` is set to `true`

get.description: List all available mailing lists. Returns a paginated list of mailing lists.

post.description: If qrcode_url is provided, it will be used as the default QR Code URL when placing orders with this mailing list.

sub_account_id.description: ID of the sub-account to associate with this mailing list. If not provided, the mailing list will be associated with the main account.

qrcode_url.description: QR Code URL for the mailing list.

get.description: Gets a mailing list by ID. Returns a single mailing list object.
Retrieve recipients for a specific mailing list.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Return only recipients updated since this date/time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

post.description: This call will purchase a radius search mailing listing and add it to your account. Each record added to the mailing list costs $.05. You can specify the number of records to return (up to 10,000) and the address/postal code to center the search around. You can also specify a mailing_list_id to add the results to an existing mailing list, or leave it blank to create a new mailing list.

mailing_list_id.description: ID of the mailing list to add the radius search results to.  If not provided, a new mailing list will be created.

address.description: Street address to use for center of nearest neighbor search.

postal_code.description: Postal code to use for center of nearest neighbor search.

record_count.description: Number of nearest neighbors to search for.

record_types.description: Which type of records to search for

append_data.description: Append phone and email to each record for an additional fee ($.20 per record).

use_property_owner.description: Use Property Owners Address when searching for a commercial record_type.

message.example: No neighbors could be found with search parameters.

post.description: Send a 4x6, 6x9, or 6x11 postcard.  Any order can be previewed by setting the `preview` parameter to true - links to PNG previews of the front and back of the postcard will be returned in the response.

image_template.description: ID of image template to use for front of postcard.  Required if front_image_url is not specified.

front_image_url.description: URL to image to use for front of postcard. Must be 1875px by 1275px for 4x6/6x9 postcards or 3337px x 1777px for 6x11 Postcards.  Required if image_template is not specified.

message.description: Handwritten message content used for content on back of postcard. Required if message_template is not specified.
message.example: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

message_template.description: ID of message template to use for content on back of postcard. Required if message is not specified.

use_custom_background.description: Use custom background image. This can be used to turn off the default background image.

custom_background_image.description: URL to custom background image to use for back of postcard.  This image will be placed behind the handwritten message.  Must be 1875px by 1275px for 4x6/6x9 postcards or 3337px x 1777px for 6x11 Postcards.

qrcode_url.description: URL to Autogenerate QR Code on back of postcard. If not specified, account default QR code URL will be used.

4x6 w/ Image URL/Recipients.summary: 4x6 Postcard with Custom Image and Recipients
4x6 w/ Image URL/Recipients.description: Example of sending a 4x6 postcard using a custom front image URL, handwritten message, and an array of recipients with custom fields.

6x9 w/ Templates/QR Code.summary: 6x9 Postcard with Templates and QR Code
6x9 w/ Templates/QR Code.description: Example of sending a 6x9 postcard using predefined image and message templates, targeting specific mailing lists, and including a QR code for recipient engagement.

6x9 w/ Custom Background/Standard.summary: 6x9 Postcard with Custom Background and Standard Mail
6x9 w/ Custom Background/Standard.description: Example of sending a 6x9 postcard with a custom background image, specific handwriting style, and using standard mail delivery (lower cost option).

6x11 w/ Radius Search.description: Example of sending a large 6x11 postcard using radius search to automatically find and target recipients within a specific geographic area, with custom message and image URL.

get.description:
Build image for the front of your postcard or notecard.  Includes ability to set dynmiac fields and QR code.  This does not create an order, it simply builds the image and returns a URL to the image.  You can then use this image URL in your order creation request.

 ## Dynamic Data Tags

Use these tags in your header, sub-header, background image URL, and QR Code/Redirect URL to have recipient data automatically added further personalizing each postcard.
- `~FULL_NAME~`
- `~FIRST_NAME~`
- `~COMPANY~`
- `~ADDRESS~`
- `~ADDRESS2~`
- `~CITY~`
- `~STATE~`
- `~ZIP~`
- `~EMAIL~`
- `~PHONE~`
- `~CUSTOM1~`
- `~CUSTOM2~`
- `~CUSTOM3~`
- `~CUSTOM4~`
- `~YOUR_FULL_NAME~`
- `~YOUR_FIRST_NAME~`
- `~YOUR_COMPANY~`
- `~YOUR_EMAIL~`
- `~YOUR_PHONE~`

parameters.name: background_url
parameters.description:
Background Image URL sits behind the generated dynamic image.  Can be one of the following
- `~MAP_VIEW~` for Google Map View. 
- `~STREET_VIEW~` for Google Street View.
- Valid HTTP png or jpg URL

schema.example: Scan the QR code to get an immediate value for ~ADDRESS~.

parameters.name: redirect_url
parameters.description:
Location to redirect recipeint to on QR Code Scan. Can be one of the following
- `~MESSAGE_QR~` for Message Template QR Code
- Valid http URL

parameters.name: logo_url
parameters.description:
Image Logo to use.  Can be one of the following
- `~YOUR_LOGO~` for your branding logo
- `~YOUR_SYMBOL~`for your branding symbol
- Valid HTTP png or jpg URL

parameters.name: overlay_url
parameters.description: Overlay Image URL sits in front of the generated dynamic image.   Must be 1875x1275 png or jpg.

handwriting_style_id.description: Unique ID of the handwriting style

sample.description: Sample image URL of the handwriting style

other.description: Giftcard Brands that don't fit in other categories

get.description: List all available Giftcard brands as a flat list.
